first_translate: fiona...?
I just received news that...
...abel has gone missing.
it’s from jerome.
apparently there was a sudden increase in demonic activity around haylon recently.
apparentl y there was a sudden increase in demonic activity around haylon recently.
and so abel went out himself...
and so abel went out himself...
...in order to find the cause behind this phenomenon.
but after that,
he never returned home.
did you ask me to take care of the manor because--
wait, don’t tell me...
are you planning on going back to haylon by yourself, my lady?
well...
jerome asked for my help specifically.
and besides, I have no one else to bring along anyway.
if his grace is missing, then something must’ve happened.

hangle: 게다가 현재 헤일론의 무력으로 애를 먹을 정도라면 더욱이요.
first_translate: moreover, if even the forces at haylon are struggling to deal with whatever is happening, things could get dangerous.
that's right. it would be inefficient for me to go alone.

hangle: 그렇지만 이런 일에 당장 데려갈 만한 인력이 있을까?
first_translate: but do we really have anyone available to send immediately?

hangle: 급하게 준비하는 만큼 다수는 안 돼.
first_translate: since we’re preparing everything last minute, we can only send a small group.
what am I supposed to do...?
I’m coming too.
siegren...?
but what about--?

hangle: 아벨의 생사 여부도 알 수 없는 상황에서,
first_translate: in a situation where we still haven’t found out whether or not abel is alive,
do you expect me to let you head off all by yourself as well?
now look whose trying to calm whom down...
then again,
of course sigg wouldn’t feel comfortable sending me into danger like this.
of course sigg wouldn’t feel comfortable sending me into danger like this.
on top of that,
the thought of losing both abel and myself...
the thought of losing both abel and myself...
you’d probably end up being left here all alone.
you'd be left all by yourself.
you'd be left all by yourself.
I know exactly why you’re worried.
let me think about it some more.
as long as abel’s daughter is under my protection,
this decision falls entirely upon me since the letter came addressed to me.
this decision falls entirely upon me since the letter came addressed to me.
I also feel anxious and concerned.
not just because of abel,
but because this may turn out to be quite risky business.
so,
I’ll make the best choice possible once again.
even though I said those bold words to siegren,
even though I said those bold words to siegren,
I still can’t decide what to do yet...

hangle: 준비하는 동안 어디 알릴 수도 없으니…
first_translate: I won’t be able to inform everyone while making preparations either...

hangle: 초대에 응했던 파티들도 빠질 수 없고….
first_translate: and I can’t cancel any parties that already accepted our invitation...
I’m exhausted...

hangle: 그 술은 의외로 도수가 센 편이니 천천히 마셔요.
first_translate: be careful when drinking that wine. its alcohol content is stronger than expected.
your face looks pale these days...
it tastes sweet today...
this wine is delicious...
taking care of invitations again today
a high-end perfume that’s popular lately...
isn’t she lovely?
my heart feels lighter now...
livia always looks beautiful.
could house priscilla truly support her highness?
could house priscella truly support her highness?

hangle: 아주 만약에, 그녀와 적이 되면 몹시 아쉽겠지.
first_translate: if they were ever to become enemies, how unfortunate that would be.
I keep thinking about what siegren told me regarding the princess...
hgh...
I need to continue pondering over this matter.
can I help you?
oh dear,
pardon me for interrupting your conversation, ladies.
if you knew it was rude, then perhaps you shouldn’t have come over in the first place,
count bill curtis.
where did I see him before? he seems familiar somehow...
I remember hearing his name somewhere too...

hangle: 죄송하지만 함께 계신 분께 볼일이 있어서요.
first_translate: forgive me, but I actually wanted to speak with the person next to you.

hangle: 처음 뵙는 것 같은데, 무슨 일이시죠?
first_translate: I believe we've never met before. what brings you here?
nice meeting you, lady fiona halyon.
please call me by my first name.
why does he seem so suspicious...?

hangle: 리비아도 이 남자를 별로 좋아하는 것 같지 않고.
first_translate: livy doesn’t appear to like him very much either.
I doubt anything will happen.
how may I assist you?
recently...
did you receive the letter I sent you?
ah...
I remember now.
I had forgotten about it due to abel’s disappearance.
the letter I got recently...
lady fiona,
I have been admiring you...
...for a very long time.
could I...
...have a moment of your precious time?
when did he start taking interest in me?
it isn’t wise for a noblewoman to be alone...

hangle: 그러나 자신에게 호감을 가진 남자와 단둘이 있는 건
first_translate: ...with someone she barely knows, especially if that person harbors feelings toward her.
...with someone she barely knows, especially if that person harbors feelings toward her.
of course,
it wouldn’t pose a problem for me personally.
alright.
I'll roast him alive if necessary.
